headline: Reported Earlier, Omnicom Prices $1.7B USD Senior Notes And €600M Euro Senior Notes Offerings Across Four Tranches, Proceeds To Repay 2026 Senior Notes And General Corporate Purposes
summary: $400 million aggregate principal amount of 4.200% Senior Notes due 2029 $700 million aggregate principal amount of 5.000% Senior Notes due 2033 $600 million aggregate principal amount of 5.300% Senior Notes due

raw.summary: $400 million aggregate principal amount of 4.200% Senior Notes due 2029 $700 million aggregate principal amount of 5.000% Senior Notes due 2033 $600 million aggregate principal amount of 5.300% Senior Notes due

headline: OMNICOM PRICES SENIOR NOTES OFFERINGS
summary: Omnicom (NYSE: OMC) today announced the pricing of its public offerings of (i) $1.7 billion aggregate principal amount of senior notes (collectively, the "USD Notes") to be issued by Omnicom and (ii) €600 million aggregate principal amount of senior notes to be issued by Omnicom Finance Holdings plc (the "Euro Notes Issuer"), a wholly owned indirect subsidiary of Omnicom, which Euro Notes (as defined below) will be fully and unconditionally guaranteed by Omnicom.
